suncertify.ui

Interface ClientConfigDialog

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConfigDialog
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientConfigDialogGUI

    public interface ClientConfigDialog
extends ConfigDialog
    ClientConfigDialog extends ConfigDialog and provides more specific configuration options for when running in client mode.
    Author:
    Kieran O'Brien

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getServerHost()
      Gets the value entered in the text field for the server host address
      java.lang.String getServerPort()
      Gets the value entered in the text field for the server port

      • getServerHost

        java.lang.String getServerHost()
        Gets the value entered in the text field for the server host address
        Returns:

        java.lang.String getServerPort()
        Gets the value entered in the text field for the server port
